==========
The Bezos Blueprint (Gallo, Carmine)
- Your Highlight on page 45 | Location 920-922 | Added on Tuesday, May 23, 2023 1:05:21 PM

So let’s replace rules with tools and strategies. Tools are flexible. We choose the right tool for the job. A strategy combines art and science, and persuasion is very much a skill that requires knowledge of both art and science. Yes, learn the rules, but don’t let them get in your way.
